item.title: Social Engineering - A Tool for Today's Criminal Actors
item.author: Rich
item.description: Criminal activity, as with anything in life, evolves with the passage of time. My career in law enforcement began in 2009, which doesn’t seem that long ago for some. However, the method of criminal activity and the methods of investigating the same have changed. Many of the more common facets of crime still exist and occur commonly today, to include: Thefts, Robberies and Burglaries DUI and other Driving Offense Domestic Violence Offenses Sexual Assaults Child Abuse & Neglect Scams and Financial Exploitation So what is different today?
